content:
Q: When will the renewal or new car insurance policy information be transmitted and updated into LTA database for Road Tax Renewal?
A: The data will be transmitted to LTA in real-time/near real-time.
questions: How quickly is car insurance policy information updated in the LTA database?
What is the transmission speed of new car insurance details to the LTA?
Is the update of car insurance policy information to the LTA database instantaneous?
When can I expect my car insurance renewal details to reflect in the LTA database for road tax purposes?
How does the transmission of car insurance policy data to LTA work?
What type of transmission is used for updating car insurance policy information to the LTA?
After renewing my car insurance, how soon will it be visible in the LTA system?
Is there a delay in updating the LTA database with new or renewed car insurance policies?
Can I renew my road tax immediately after updating my car insurance policy?
What does real-time/near real-time transmission mean for car insurance policy updates to LTA?
